---
category: news
title: "UNESCO releases report on the mapping of K-12 Artificial Intelligence curricula"
excerpt: "A mapping of government-endorsed AI curricula”, the first report on the global status of K-12 AI curricula. The current uses and impact of Artificial Intelligence (AI) has spurred an urgency to create an international consensus on how to equip children with the competences needed to understand the power but also the ethical dilemmas related to this new technology."
